author: Yeveiras
title: A Succubus Quest To Greatness V3 (Easier mode by GhostfireXXV)

objectives.reward: One "Lure" of your choice.
objectives.value: Seduce and corrupt a nun, she must worship you as her one and only Goddess.

objectives.reward: Obtain "Divine Lust" you are able to influence beings (with a lower tier than your own) to worship you as the epitome of beauty.
objectives.value: Seduce and corrupt 10 nuns, they must worship you as their one and only Goddess.
Create a religion centered around You and your race, and must have at least 10.000 faithfull.

objectives.reward: Ascend and become the Succubus Goddess of Lust Beauty and of all "Royal Succubus".
objectives.value: Your religion must be the most widespread in the world.
Seduce and add to your harem 5 members of the main cast (The world does not matter).

objectives.reward: Obtain "Desire Sight" with a single look you can see all the desires and fetishes of the target.
objectives.value: Add to your retinue all the members of the Protagonist's harem.

objectives.reward: 100 credits plus "Lust Sight" you can manipulate the lust and arousa of anyone in your sight. in yourl
Obtain "Succubus Charm" you can make any being (with a lower tier than your own) instantly fall in love with you.
Obtain "Divine Fleshcrafting" manipulate the flesh of the living and dead to your desire, you could transform a carp in a dragon
objectives.value: Seduce and add to your retinue a goddess of Love.
Seduce and add to your retinue all goddesses of Love Beauty and fertility of your world.

objectives.reward: Obtain "Virgins Bane" lures are 5 times more effective on virgnins.
objectives.value: Seduce and add to your retinue a goddess of Chastity/Virginity.

objectives.reward: you may now create demonic contracts with other beings, you can fulfill any wish as long as you have enough power.
A personal hell is added to your demiplane, the souls that you take through contract end up here, use them as you see fit.
You are Satan but with Boobs, all demonic entities will see you as their rightfull ruler and will obey you unquestionably.

objectives.value: Tranform the world in wich you reside in a world of lust sex and desire.

objectives.reward: Your retinue pregnancies will only last 3 months and be void of pain and difficulties.
objectives.value: Have 10 members of your retinue pregnant.

objectives.reward: Any member of the "Royal Succubus" race has access to a minor version of your Lures, and "Desire Sight","Lust Sight"

conditions.value: Number of "Royal Succubus" in the world at least equal to 1000.
The race must be known to at least 80% of the world population (either supernatural or mortal world).
"Royal Succubus" must be known as the most sexually skilled race.
"Royal Succubus" must be in the top 5 most beautifull races of the world.
"Royal Succubus" must be in the top 10 most powerfull races of the world.
Have an harem of at least 30 members and they must be part of your retinue.

desc:
[A modified version of the original mission, all the credits goes to the original creator]

May only accept during "Chargen"

Succubus are one of the most known and desired demonic entities, but in most cases they are either cannon fodder or evil soul sucking monsters. We wish to introduce a new perspective to this popular race and that's were you come in.
You shall be reborn as a new specie of Succubus handcrafted here at the company it's name is "Royal Succubus", the following are some of the key feature of this new marvelous race:

-Base tier for any "Royal Succubus" is Tier5
-Heightened libido (around double that of an horny teenager)
-Supernatural beauty, streght and speed.
-Medium wound regeneration (can heal from most wounds but the regrowing of amputated limbs takes days, of course you would still die if you get your head chopped off)
-Immune to incest deficiensies.
-Empowering Lust (Satiation of your carnal desires empowers you and the partner/s that partecipated, boosting permanently all of your stats by 25%, works only once per day for each retinue members, big harems are advised for peak performance)
-Only female or hermaphrodite(With female appearance)
-Feeds on arousal, lust and sexual satisfaction (may still eat and drink but it won't satisfy hunger or thirst) the more days without feeding the weaker it gets the higher the tier the lower the need
-Going against it's own lustfull nature takes great force of will
-As long as it's regularly fed a "Royal Succubus" can live forever.
-Master of Eromancy

After accepting this mission you will never be able to take any heritage except for "Pirate", "Mastermind" and "Infernal" until you complete the mission, you also won't be able to change your race through any means even after the mission has ended, only making a hybrid at max.

Your main objective is simple, propagate and get famous, in simple words expand the numbers of your race, create a big harem and make your race vastly known through the mortal or supernatural world, you must also build a reputation for being sexually skilled, beautifull and strong.

The fate (plot) of this world lessened, this makes the plot armor of the each characters notably less reliable, if they needed plot to survive, then is provable that now they will die or be severely harmed
We recomed you to buy Aura (RWBY) in your earliest convenience, as will bypass one of the weakness of Yaoyorozu Momo
We also recommend you to buy each of the different classes as a tier 1 Template Stack, as ech one will give you valuable experience in their different styles of combat
You will stay in the world until the end of the year at minimum

desc:
Well Contractor, it seems that a newbie was ganked in real life just before we could finalize his contract and send him in his merry way, and now we have a complete build and a selected timeline but no contractor to farm it, and the Archangel of Benevolence is breathing down our necks rushing us into finding someone to fulfill her fallen Contractors job, lucky us that you came along...

reward: A copy of Sanjouno Haruhime and a copy of a piece of the shattered Killing Stone for each in your Retinue
author: myfunvideos
title: For Beauty's Own Gain - Killing Stone!

objectives.reward: Instant Capture of Ishtar

objectives.value: Have fun with an Amazon and climax inside them. (Repeatable)
Sell your 'services' (and body) in the Red Light District. Bring in the Valis for the Ishtar Familia. (Repeatable)

objectives.reward: Half Credit value of each member of the Freya Familia killed.
objectives.value: Participate and destroy the Freya Familia after the Ishtar Familia obtains the Killing Stone fragments.

objectives.reward: Ishtar and her Familia complete Trust in you
objectives.value: Make Freya disappear for Ishtar's satisfaction whether by Killing her and sending her back to Tenkai or Selling her.

objectives.reward: Instant Capture of Hestia
objectives.value: Somehow, someway, defeat Bell Cranel, by any means necessary.

objectives.reward: Instant Capture of Phryne Jamil. We won't blame you if Sell her. You can also scrub the memory of her violation from your mind.
objectives.value: Do your absolute best to endure Phryne's advances and having her way with you until the Freya and her Familia are gone.

conditions.value: Protect the Killing Stone from being destroyed prematurely before the Ritual.
Bindings on Haruhime will not work for this Mission as she must 'die' for Ritual to transpire.
Goddess Ishtar must not be killed before she can exact her revenge.
Cannot dissuade Ishtar Familia by using some other method than the Killing Stone Ritual
This Haruhime (if 'killed' by successful Ritual) cannot be revived, as described by Takemikazuchi by other methods of Resurrection

desc:
Listen up, Contractor, because this Mission will be...while not necessarily hard, it will be very tricky.

For every Renard, they each contain a unique and powerful Spell, a Youjutsu, that is coveted and kept close to whichever God or Goddess gets their hands on them.

One such Renard is Sanjouno Haruhime, a girl who was sold like a slave and brought to the Ishtar Familia with the goal of obtaining her power to 'Level-Up' whenever they want. It essentially grants anyone endowed with the Falna boosted Stats if they were a Level higher than they currently were.

A related item that must be protected for this Mission is an item that, while dark in nature and horribly heretical, can trap the Renard's Youjutsu and Soul and spread it to others by a certain sacrificial ritual, also known as the Killing Stone.

However, because of the actions of a frustrated Aisha Belka, the plan was significantly delayed and later stopped by the Hestia and Freya Familia, both for differing reasons.

You will have two routes you can be brought in, before Aisha destroys the first Killing Stone the Ishtar Familia originally had or sometime before the day of Ishtar Familia's Canon disbanding.

It's simple, allow the Killing Stone Ritual to transpire successfully, trapping the soul of Sanjouno Haruhime into the Killing Stone on the Night of the Full Moon before breaking it to be used for the Ishtar Familia in their war with the Freya Familia.

Good luck!

objectives.reward: World peace

conditions.value: Drop the world crime rate by 50 percent
sell 100,000 kg of weed

desc:
Did you ever think that the world of one piece would be more peaceful if everyone just chilled out a bit, well we did so let's find out if it would work. 

Fun fact did you know weed doesn't exist in the one piece universe, so let's change that. Your job is to produce copious amounts of high quality weed by using the seed's we provide you to get as many people high as you can and stop major conflict's by making people to high to fight.
